description.title: Aloha!
description.paragraph1: This site provides ChatGPT for the Secretariat students without the need for a proxy or account registration. It may serve as a faster and more convenient alternative for most students, without the need for CAPTCHA verification. If you have some interest and understanding, you can also try the question-and-answer templates specially developed for PKU OIR, which have been Fine-Tuned for commonly used texts, letter formats, and Peking University-related vocabulary and concepts, with the aim of providing a smoother and more efficient AI workflow.
description.paragraph2: As a project developed in my spare time, this site is still under continuous improvement. Please provide valuable feedback for bugs through my contact information in the lower-left corner.
description.paragraph3: This project is based on the open-source project ChatGPTFreeApp modified and deployed by <0>ztjhz</0>, which is hereby noted.

sourceCode: Checkout the <0>source code</0> on GitHub and give it a ⭐️!

privacyStatement.title: Privacy Statement
privacyStatement.paragraph1: We highly value your privacy and are committed to safeguarding the privacy of our users. We do not collect or store any text you enter or receive from the OpenAI server in any form. Our source code is available for your inspection to verify this statement.
privacyStatement.paragraph2: We prioritise the security of your API key and handle it with utmost care. If you use your own API key, your key is exclusively stored on your browser and never shared with any third-party entity. It is solely used for the intended purpose of accessing the OpenAI API and not for any other unauthorised use.
